title: Lawsuit accuses Tesla of exaggerating driving range to boost EV sales
description: A group of Tesla owners accused the automaker of inflating in advertisements the distance the vehicles can travel on a single charge.

title: Job site AI assesses candidate qualifications but also employer tastes
description: Your résumé is only part of how LinkedIn, Indeed and ZipRecruiter’s AI evaluates you as a potential match for an employer.

title: Agence France-Presse takes Elon Musk’s X to court over news content
description: The move comes as tech giants face growing pressure at home and abroad to pay publishers for news content.
